{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Assistant Head of Sales",
  "description": "Earl Consulting Lagos is Nigeria&#39;s premier management consulting firm, dedicated to empowering people and organizations to reach their full potential. With over 10 years of experience, we have provided people management and human resource solutions to some of Africa&#39;s leading companies across diverse industries, including oil &amp; gas, telecoms, manufacturing, financial services, FMCG, and technology. We offer relevant and innovative solutions to our client&#39;s most pressing people challenges.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Head of Sales

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Formulating and articulating the Strategic plan for Sales growth and other revenue streams to maximize income to achieve the Company&rsquo;s objectives with Collaboration with the Head of Sales.
	Promotion and institutionalization of positioning Chateau-Royal as the premier Real Estate company in Nigeria and the Chateau-Royal umbrella brand as a top-of-mind brand in the real estate industry in Nigeria, and generate demand for all company real estate products and construction.
	Branding, packaging, and messaging Real estate products and services, building brand awareness to ensure that the Company&rsquo;s real estate products are market-leading products, for effective demand and looking at the commercial potential of products and services, identifying markets target audiences and maximizing exposure to these groups with a compelling buy pull strategy.
	Overseeing Product definition, Product differentiation, Market segmentation, and positioning and developing Marketing and Communications Strategies and Coordinating implementation via social media marketing, TV, search engine marketing, telesales, e-mail marketing, direct mail, trade shows, exhibitions, promotional events, etc. and managing the company&#39;s websites, to effectively market and sell all the company&rsquo;s real estate products.
	Preparation of the Company&#39;s Sales and Marketing Budgets and driving performance to achieve the Sales budgets, and Controlling the Marketing &amp; Selling Expenses, to achieve approved budgets for the realization of Company&#39;s margins and achievement of its Earnings objectives.
	Conceive or identify Products &amp; services to be sold to the market or adapted from Products &amp; services and of the company, liaising with Consulting and Construction Divisions, to define the &ldquo;products&rdquo; and refine products for sale to pre-identified target audience to meet an existing need/demand.
	Providing support, motivation, and direction to the Sales organization to execute marketing models, marketing promotions to stimulate sales, and pursue new sales channels and partners for the prompt delivery of Sales to achieve Sales targets.
	Evolving Pricing strategy for real estate products, using Key Selling points such as quality, views, heights, location, target market, and other desirable features to determine optimal Sales prices based on market conditions and cost of production/profit targets.
	Manage buyer/client payment plans, credit terms and liaise with the Finance department to ensure timely collection of sales proceeds from customers.
	Conduct market research, control survey and do competition analysis to identify customers&rsquo; requirements and loyalty, evaluate trends and continually monitor our market share in those markets, innovative products and offers to constantly sniff out new opportunities for our products and services that are outside-the-box.


Educational Qualification and Experience


	B.Sc. plus M.Sc. in Social Sciences or Management
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in same role in the real estate industry
	Must not be more than 40 years of age.


Required Skills / Attributes:


	Good oral and written communication skills
	Good team player and excellent people skills
	Good interpersonal skills, people management, and negotiating skills
	High awareness of quality issues and attention to details
	Strong sense of professionalism, integrity, and sound judgment and tact
	High level of sincerity and honesty with a pragmatic and proactive approach to business
	Ability to stay calm under pressure
	Strong organizational skills, Solution and service-oriented
	Ability to maintain confidentiality
	Good understanding of market research techniques, data analysis, and statistics methods
	Proficiency in the use of Enterprise-Wide Applications, such as SAGE or SAP, MS Office, and other marketing software (e.g., CRM).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified&nbsp;candidates should send their CV with Cover Letter to:&nbsp;earlconsultinglagos@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-31",
  "validThrough": "2026-04-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Earl Consulting Lagos"
    
  },

Assistant Head of Sales Job at Earl Consulting Lagos




        
    

        
        Earl Consulting Lagos is Nigeria's premier management consulting firm, dedicated to empowering people and organizations to reach their full potential. With over 10 years of experience, we have provided people management and human resource solutions to some of Africa's leading companies across diverse industries, including oil & gas, telecoms, manufacturing, financial services, FMCG, and technology. We offer relevant and innovative solutions to our client's most pressing people challenges.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Head of Sales

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Formulating and articulating the Strategic plan for Sales growth and other revenue streams to maximize income to achieve the Company’s objectives with Collaboration with the Head of Sales.
	Promotion and institutionalization of positioning Chateau-Royal as the premier Real Estate company in Nigeria and the Chateau-Royal umbrella brand as a top-of-mind brand in the real estate industry in Nigeria, and generate demand for all company real estate products and construction.
	Branding, packaging, and messaging Real estate products and services, building brand awareness to ensure that the Company’s real estate products are market-leading products, for effective demand and looking at the commercial potential of products and services, identifying markets target audiences and maximizing exposure to these groups with a compelling buy pull strategy.
	Overseeing Product definition, Product differentiation, Market segmentation, and positioning and developing Marketing and Communications Strategies and Coordinating implementation via social media marketing, TV, search engine marketing, telesales, e-mail marketing, direct mail, trade shows, exhibitions, promotional events, etc. and managing the company's websites, to effectively market and sell all the company’s real estate products.
	Preparation of the Company's Sales and Marketing Budgets and driving performance to achieve the Sales budgets, and Controlling the Marketing & Selling Expenses, to achieve approved budgets for the realization of Company's margins and achievement of its Earnings objectives.
	Conceive or identify Products & services to be sold to the market or adapted from Products & services and of the company, liaising with Consulting and Construction Divisions, to define the “products” and refine products for sale to pre-identified target audience to meet an existing need/demand.
	Providing support, motivation, and direction to the Sales organization to execute marketing models, marketing promotions to stimulate sales, and pursue new sales channels and partners for the prompt delivery of Sales to achieve Sales targets.
	Evolving Pricing strategy for real estate products, using Key Selling points such as quality, views, heights, location, target market, and other desirable features to determine optimal Sales prices based on market conditions and cost of production/profit targets.
	Manage buyer/client payment plans, credit terms and liaise with the Finance department to ensure timely collection of sales proceeds from customers.
	Conduct market research, control survey and do competition analysis to identify customers’ requirements and loyalty, evaluate trends and continually monitor our market share in those markets, innovative products and offers to constantly sniff out new opportunities for our products and services that are outside-the-box.


Educational Qualification and Experience


	B.Sc. plus M.Sc. in Social Sciences or Management
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in same role in the real estate industry
	Must not be more than 40 years of age.


Required Skills / Attributes:


	Good oral and written communication skills
	Good team player and excellent people skills
	Good interpersonal skills, people management, and negotiating skills
	High awareness of quality issues and attention to details
	Strong sense of professionalism, integrity, and sound judgment and tact
	High level of sincerity and honesty with a pragmatic and proactive approach to business
	Ability to stay calm under pressure
	Strong organizational skills, Solution and service-oriented
	Ability to maintain confidentiality
	Good understanding of market research techniques, data analysis, and statistics methods
	Proficiency in the use of Enterprise-Wide Applications, such as SAGE or SAP, MS Office, and other marketing software (e.g., CRM).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV with Cover Letter to: earlconsultinglagos@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Procurement Assistant Job at New Hope Liuhe




        
    

        
        New Hope Liuhe also known as New Hope Agric and Tech is an agriculturalfeed manufacturing industry, producing chicken feed, pig feed and also fish feed.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Assistant
Job Location: Logbara, Along Abeokuta Express Way, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	A Procurement Assistant supports an organization’s purchasing operations by contactingsuppliers, preparing purchase orders, tracking deliveries, and maintaining accurate records to ensure smooth supply chain management.
	Male are encouraged to apply.
	Candidates must have good knowledge of microsoft excel.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: new_hope5@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Social media handler",
  "description": "New Hope Liuhe also known as New Hope Agric and Tech is an agricultural feed manufacturing industry, producing chicken feed, pig feed and also fish feed.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant",
  "description": "T.O.N Corporate Services&nbsp; -&nbsp;Our client provides businesses with a professional phone system that enables teams to manage customer calls efficiently. Their goal is to help businesses improve the quality of their customer interactions while enhancing operational efficiency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Executive Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos, Nigeria
Job Type: Full time

Job Description


	We are seeking an Executive Assistant to provide administrative and operational support to senior management.
	Responsible for calendar management, coordination, documentation, and day-to-day executive support.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage executive calendars, meetings, and schedules
	Coordinate travel arrangements and logistics
	Prepare documents, reports, presentations, and correspondence
	Take meeting notes and track action items
	Handle emails, calls, and follow-ups on behalf of the executive
	Maintain proper filing and documentation systems
	Coordinate with internal teams and external stakeholders
	Support special projects and ad-hoc administrative tasks


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in a relevant field with&nbsp;3&ndash;5 years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, or similar role
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Good written and verbal communication skills
	Ability to handle confidential information
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks
	Desirable: Master&rsquo;s degree; non-profit experience; Board-level support; travel readiness.

Executive Assistant Job at T.O.N Corporate Services




        
    

        
        T.O.N Corporate Services  - Our client provides businesses with a professional phone system that enables teams to manage customer calls efficiently. Their goal is to help businesses improve the quality of their customer interactions while enhancing operational efficiency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria
Job Type: Full time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking an Executive Assistant to provide administrative and operational support to senior management.
	Responsible for calendar management, coordination, documentation, and day-to-day executive support.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage executive calendars, meetings, and schedules
	Coordinate travel arrangements and logistics
	Prepare documents, reports, presentations, and correspondence
	Take meeting notes and track action items
	Handle emails, calls, and follow-ups on behalf of the executive
	Maintain proper filing and documentation systems
	Coordinate with internal teams and external stakeholders
	Support special projects and ad-hoc administrative tasks


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field with 3–5 years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, or similar role
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Good written and verbal communication skills
	Ability to handle confidential information
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks
	Desirable: Master’s degree; non-profit experience; Board-level support; travel readiness.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Pharmacy Manager Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
Kiyix Recruitment Hub is a recruitment agaency that bridges the gap between employers and emplyoyees. Our goal at Kiyix Recruitment and Motivation Hub is to help create one million jobs in Nigeria by 2030. We strive to help make businesses in Africa great by providing them with good staff and enablingthe staff to become great.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacy Manager

Job Location: Randle, Surulere - Lagos

Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a qualified and experienced Pharmacy Manager to lead the operations of a community pharmacy in Surulere.
	The ideal candidate must be business-minded, customer-focused, and capable of managing both the professional and administrative aspects of the pharmacy.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee daily pharmacy operations and ensure smooth workflow
	Supervise pharmacy staff and ensure compliance with professional standards
	Dispense medications accurately and provide appropriate patient counseling
	Ensure proper storage, handling, and documentation of pharmaceutical products
	Manage inventory, stock levels, and supplier relationships
	Monitor expiry dates and ensure regulatory compliance at all times.
	Handle customer complaints professionally and ensure excellent service delivery.


Requirements


	Bsc in Science related courses,
	Minimum of 2–4 years of experience in a retail/community pharmacy.
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Good knowledge of inventory management and pharmacy software
	Excellent communication and customer service skills
	Business and sales-driven mindset.


Salary
N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chinenye.kiyix@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.     

    

        Click here to Apply
